name: Space Shooter (itch) (Seona Bellamy)
description:
As the best pilot in the Star League, you are tasked with fighting off the oncoming horde of enemy ships.

The League will pay you a bounty for each enemy killed, but be warned: enemies killed by ramming are only worth half as much (they don't want to encourage you to damage yourself!). Use the bounty to keep your ship in top repair and buy upgrades to make the fight easier.

Instructions

  • Move with the WASD or arrow keys.
  • Click the mouse to fire your laser.
